completeListOfAbilities.name: バーニングレイヴ＋
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃
対象に3ACTION「防御力小ダウン」付与
自身に3ACTION「デュエル」
6ACTION「最大BRV中アップ」付与
「デュエル」付与中 「バーニングレイヴ」に変化し
通常「BRV攻撃」も「BRV攻撃＋」に変化

completeListOfAbilities.name: Burning Combo
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit melee BRV attack
Target: 3 turns DEF Down I
Self: 6 turns MAX BRV Up II
Then triggers following actions:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK、 then BRV × 1.2、 followed by 2-hit group ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack
 • 50% HP damage dealt to non-targets
High turn rate
Cancels Duel、 returns Burning Combo、 Meteor Combo to normal after use

Target: 3 turns DEF Down II
Self: 6 turns MAX BRV Up II、 PHY ATK Up I
Then triggers following action:
 • Melee BRV attack + HP attack
High turn rate
Cancels Duel、 returns Burning Combo、 Meteor Combo to normal after use

passives.name: Self-Realization
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt while Duel active\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack、 HP Attack
passives.short_desc: Self-Realization: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: High Speed Buff
passives.desc: Largely raises SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: High Speed Buff: Raises SPD

passives.name: Punch Rush Extension
passives.desc:
When using Punch Rush:
 • MAX BRV Up II becomes Balamb's Rowdy Punk with moderate ATK boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Higher turn rate
 • Triggers additional Booya + HP attack after using Punch Rush while own HP is at least 50% of MAX

When using Burning Rave:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slightly increased HP damage to non-targets
 • Higher turn rate

When using BRV Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
passives.short_desc: Punch Rush Extension: Boost to Punch Rush

passives.name: Buff Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Booya Extension
passives.desc:
When using Booya:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage
 • MAX BRV Up II becomes Balamb's Rowdy Punk with moderate ATK boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Higher turn rate
 • Triggers additional Punch Rush + HP attack after using Booya while own HP is at least 50% of MAX

When using Meteor Barrage:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 • Higher turn rate
passives.short_desc: Booya Extension: Boost to Booya

Set Duel Blow use +1

passive.name: Weak Attack Longer
passive.desc: Raises own ATK by 10% for 6 turns when attacking target's weakness

Booya use +2
Booya、 Meteor Barrage boost
Upon using Booya:

 • Self: 6 turns PHY ATK Up I

passive.desc: May equip EX ability Different Beat

passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Different Beat

passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Different Beat

passives.name: Different Beat Guard Penetration Force
passives.desc: When using Different Beat:\n • BRV attack ignores DEF\n • Tremendous BRV damage boost

passives.name: Combo BRV Hit Plus Advance++
passives.desc:
When using Burning Combo:
 • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using Meteor Combo:
 • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (BRV attack hit count increased by 1; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Combo BRV Hit Plus Advance++: Boost to Burning Combo、 Meteor Combo

passives.name: Different Beat Spread Up
passives.desc: When using Different Beat:\n • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
passives.short_desc: Different Beat Spread Up: Boost to Different Beat
